TextView.android:text:
* Payment will be made in two parts.

 * Payment will be through the admin only.

 * Payment can only be made through Paytm or UPI.

 * The first half of the payment will be made by the 
 customer to the admin once the customer 
 chooses the developer.

 * The developer will receive this half of payment once 
 the developer uploads the project to the admin.

 * To download the files uploaded by the developer
 the customer has to make a payment of the
 remaining amount.

 * The amount will then be transferred to the
 developer within 7 working days if no
 complains arise from the customer side.
